1563542681_189CZFM3FgMFXz6XvoFLNyPW6v5EB.body:
@rister I kinda agree that war might be needed, But as historically such a long period of peace is quite uncommon. Desipte what people think. War is very good at building and strengthening society as you create a clear, US vs THEM. It sounds cruel and in someway it is. However war is regarded as one of the only great unifying force there is. 

for example. The Falkland war. Argentinian was in chaos. So they started a war for the island which for the brief time it went on. Helped to keep the country together.
